snippet: Coming off a second-place finish in the Holy Bull, Hansen showed a new dimension by sitting just off the pace before taking over on the far turn.
abstract: Racehorse Hansen wins the Gotham Stakes at Aqueduct to steady his shaky profile as a Kentucky Derby contender.
lead_paragraph: Coming off a second-place finish in the Holy Bull, Hansen showed a new dimension by sitting just off the pace before taking over on the far turn.

headline.main: Hansen Takes Charge in the Gotham and Steadies His Shaky Derby Profile
headline.print_headline: Hansen Takes Charge in the Gotham and Steadies His Shaky Derby Profile
